Description: Wooden seated figure of Taweret(?); overlaid with plastered linen.
Curator's comments: Reeves in Complete Valley of the Kings, 133, now ascribes these objects to the tomb of Horemheb. G. Pinch, Magic in Ancient Egypt (London 1994), fig.51; N. Strudwick, Masterpieces of Ancient Egypt, London 2006, pp. 188-9.
Bibliographic references: Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 95)
Exhibition history: 2010 4th Nov-2011 6th March, Round Reading Room BM, Book of the Dead
